Nis nan þe on minum naman mægen wyrce & mæge raðe be me yfele specan.
WSCp MARK 9.40 Se þe nis agen eow se is for eow.
WSCp MARK 9.41 Soðlice se ðe sylð drinc eow calic fulne wæteres on minum naman forþam ge Cristes synt ic eow soþ secge, ne forlyst he his mede.
WSCp MARK 9.42 And swa hwa swa gedrefð ænne of þyssum lytlingum on me gelyfendum betere him wære þæt an cweornstan wære to his swuran gecnyt & wære on sæ beworpen.
WSCp MARK 9.43 And gif þin hand þe swicað, ceorf hi of;
Betere þe is þæt þu wanhal to life ga þonne þu twa handa hæbbe & fare on helle & on unacwencedlic fyr. WSCp MARK 9.44 Þar hyra wyrm ne swylt & fyr ne bið acwenced.
WSCp MARK 9.45 And gif ðin fot swicað þe, ceorf hine of;
Betere þe is þæt þu healt ga on ece lif þonne þu hæbbe twegen fet & si aworpen on helle unacwencedlices fyres. WSCp MARK 9.46 Þar hyra wyrm ne swylt ne fyr ne bið adwæsced.
WSCp MARK 9.47 Gif þin eage þe swicað, weorp hit ut;
Betere þe is mid anum eagan gan on Godes rice þonne twa eagan hæbbende sy aworpen on helle fyr. WSCp MARK 9.48 Þar hyra wyrm ne swylt ne fyr ne bið acwenced.
WSCp MARK 9.49 Soðlice ælc man bið mid fyre gesylt
& ælc offrung bið mid sealte gesylt.
WSCp MARK 9.50 God is sealt
gif þæt sealt unsealt biþ on þam þe ge hit syltað;
Habbað sealt on eow
& habbað sibbe betwux eow.
WSCp MARK 10.1 And þanon he com on Iudeisce endas of Iordane;
þa comon eft menigu to him
& swa swa he gewunode he hi lærde eft sona.
WSCp MARK 10.2 Ða genealæhton him Pharisei & hine axodon hwæþer alyfð ænegum men his wif forlætan his þus fandigende.
WSCp MARK 10.3 Þa andswarode he him,
hwæt bead Moyses eow?
WSCp MARK 10.4 Hi sædon,
Moyses lyfde þæt man write hiwgedales boc & hi forlete.
WSCp MARK 10.5 Ða cwæð se hælend,
for eower heortan heardnesse he eow wrat þis bebod.
WSCp MARK 10.6 Fram fruman gesceafte God hi geworhte wæpnedman & wimman.
WSCp MARK 10.7 & cwæð,
for þam se mann forlæt his fæder & modor & hine his wife geþeot.
WSCp MARK 10.8 & beoð twegen on anum flæsce;
Witodlice ne synt na twegen ac an flæsc.
WSCp MARK 10.9 Þæt God gesamnode ne syndrige þæt nan man.
WSCp MARK 10.10 And eft innan huse his leorningcnihtas hine be þam ylcan ahsodon.
WSCp MARK 10.11 Ða cwæð he,
swa hwylc mann swa his wif forlæt & oþer nimð unrihthæmed he wyrcð þurh hi.
WSCp MARK 10.12 And gif þæt wif hire were forlæt & oþerne nimð heo unrihthæmð.
WSCp MARK 10.13 And hi brohton him hyra lytlingas þæt he hi æthrine;
þa ciddon his leorningcnihtas þam ðe hi brohton.
WSCp MARK 10.14 Þa se hælend hi geseah unwurðlice he hit forbead & sæde him,
lætað þa lytlingas to me cuman
& ne forbeode ge him;
Soðlice swylcera is heofona rice.
WSCp MARK 10.15 Soþlice ic secge eow
swa hwylc swa Godes rice ne onfehð swa lytling ne mæg he þæt.
WSCp MARK 10.16 Ða beclypte he hi & his handa ofer hi settende bletsode hi.
WSCp MARK 10.17 And þa he on wege eode, sum him to arn & gebigedum cneowe toforan him cwæð & bæd hine,
la goda lareow, hwæt do ic þæt ic ece lif age?
WSCp MARK 10.18 Þa cwæð se hælend,
hwi segst þu me godne;
Nis nan mann god buton God ana.
WSCp MARK 10.19 Canst þu ða bebodu,
ne unrihthæm þu,
ne slyh þu,
ne stel þu,
ne sege þu lease gewitnesse
facen ne do ðu,
wurða þinne fæder & þine modor?
WSCp MARK 10.20 Ða andswarode he,
goda Lareow, eall ðis ic geheold of minre geoguðe.
WSCp MARK 10.21 Se hælend hine þa behealdende lufode & sæde him,
an þing þe is wana;
Gesyle eall þæt ðu age
& syle hit þearfum;
þonne hæfst þu goldhord on heofonum
& cum
& folga me.
WSCp MARK 10.22 And for þam worde he wæs geunret & ferde gnornigende for þam he hæfde mycele æhta.
WSCp MARK 10.23 Þa cwæð se hælend to his leorningcnihton hine beseonde,
swyþe earfoðlice on Godes rice gað þa þe feoh habbað.
WSCp MARK 10.24 Ða forhtodon his leorningcnihtas be his wordum;
Eft se hælend him andswariende cwæð,
eala, cild, swyðe earfoðlice þa ðe on heora feo getruwigeað gað on Godes rice.
WSCp MARK 10.25 Eaþere ys olfende to farenne þurh nædle þyrel þonne se rica & se welega on Godes rice ga.
